div.p: Decade-wise temperature trend of: ( a– c)- Mean (University of Delaware) ( d– f)- Mean (IMD) ( g–i)- Maximum (IMD) ( j– l)- Minimum (IMD) ( m– o)- DTR (IMD). White circles in the plot represent statistical significance at 95% confidence level. The map was generated using MATLAB 2015b, www.mathworks.com.
